adversarial and virtual adversarial trai.from sentence:
Previous work has primarily applied adversarial and virtual adversarial training to image classification tasks .
In this work , we extend these techniques to text classification tasks and sequence models .

Adversarial perturbations.from sentence: Adversarial perturbations typically consist of making small modifications to very many real - valued inputs .

text classification.from sentence: For text classification , the input is discrete , and usually represented as a series of highdimensional one - hot vectors .

perturbation.from sentence: Because the set of high - dimensional one - hot vectors does not admit infinitesimal perturbation , we define the perturbation on continuous word embeddings instead of discrete word inputs .

regularizing.from sentence: We thus propose this approach exclusively as a means of regularizing a text classifier by stabilizing the classification function .
